entries.title: The Sims 4 is getting DLC undies and messy bathrooms in two new kits
entries.description: Things are getting real personal around here.

entries.title: More restricted military intel ends up on the War Thunder forums
entries.description: The documentation related to the F16 Fighting Falcon isn't classified, but it does have restricted distribution authorization.

entries.title: The Last of Us was HBO's second most popular series premiere in over 10 years
entries.description: It didn't beat House of the Dragon, but that would've been tough.

entries.title: Suicide Squad's leaked battle pass and in-game store triggers anger among fans
entries.description: It looks like Warner is taking a shot at making Suicide Squad a live-service game, and not everyone is happy about it.

entries.title: PC Gamer's most-anticipated games of 2023
entries.description: 30 games we think deserve your time, surveyed from the entire PC Gamer team.

entries.title: Forspoken's PC requirements are out and actually kinda weird
entries.description: But at least Square Enix's next big action-RPG confirms DirectStorage from launch.

entries.title: This modder won't stop adding Wallace from Wallace & Gromit into random games
entries.description: More rings, Gromit?

entries.title: Persona 3 Portable review
entries.description: Persona 3 Portable creeps along, but it's still top-class.

entries.title: HBO's The Last of Us premiere takes disappointingly few creative risks
entries.description: It might please the story purists, but it's too safe and a bit dull.

entries.title: How to defeat Seekers in Valheim
entries.description: They drop Carapace for the new armor set.

entries.title: Ubisoft Paris employees are going on strike to protest CEO's 'catastrophic' comments
entries.description: The union representing studio workers says Yves Guillemot is trying to blame employees for his own failures.

entries.title: Stellaris' latest DLC offers new ways to mess with pre-spaceflight societies
entries.description: My prime directive is 'do whatever I want'.

entries.title: Getty Images files suit against one of the biggest AI art tools
entries.description: Stability AI is being taken to court in the UK, accused of infringing on Getty Images' terms of service and licensing.

entries.title: Intel Arc graphics gets enthusiast-style overclocking tool
entries.description: Unofficial homebrew tool cooked up by veteran GPU overclocker.

entries.title: Blizzard is blaming NetEase for its games going offline in China next week
entries.description: Probably a better option than blaming the government.

entries.title: Your laptop will be faster and thinner in 2024 thanks to CAMM memory
entries.description: So long SO-DIMMS, and thanks for all the fun.

entries.title: How Titan Rune dungeons work in Wrath of the Lich King Classic
entries.description: You can get raid loot from these Heroic Plus dungeons.

entries.title: Modders have voiced the entirety of original Final Fantasy 7
entries.description: It's almost like a kind of Final Fantasy 7 remake, if you will.

entries.title: Atomic Heart has a great aesthetic in search of a more interesting game
entries.description: Or a more silent protagonist, at least.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 577 answer and hint for Tuesday, January 17
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #577 puzzle.
